application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 12 ii (Loading and unloading of plant and materials) and Condition 12 iii (Storage of plant and materials used in constructing the development) Appeal Ref: APP/Z5630/A/08/2090469 of planning permission 07/12889/FUL (Redevelopment of site to provide six storey building consisting A3 (restaurants & cafes) on ground floor and basement and 9 residential units comprising 6 x 1 bedroom and 3 x 2 bedroom flats)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KTCAAP Name: Kingston Town Centre AAP
KEYACH Name: Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: This consent relates solely to part ii (Loading and unloading of plant and materials) of Condition 12 and part iii (Storage of plant and materials used in constructing the development) of Condition 12 - attached to Appeal Ref: APP/Z5630/A/08/2090469 of planning permission 07/12889/FUL (Redevelopment of site to provide six storey building consisting A3 (restaurants & cafes) on ground floor and basement and 9 residential units comprising 6 x 1 bedroom and 3 x 2 bedroom flats)Reason : For the avoidance of doubt
